titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1948-07-24 - Part 2

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The file may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. End users must obtain all required permissions or consents from the owners of such rights. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry show from July 7, 1948. Featuring Louie Buck (announcer), Red Foley (host, performer), Ernest Tubb (performer), Tommy 'Butterball' Paige (performer), Old Hickory Singers including Claude Sharpe (performers), Minnie Pearl (performer), Eggie McEwen (performer), Rod Brasfield (performer), Wally Fowler and his Oak Ridge Quartet (performers), Floyd Ethridge (performer), and Milton Estes (performer). Part 1: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/633

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
